title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Complete an analysis of rocket propulsion systems, focusing on real-world applications.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze the combustion process in rocket engines, and compare efficiency across different fuel types.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a rocket nozzle for optimal thrust, and present your findings in a report.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Complete the quiz covering the fundamental principles of aerodynamics.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze airflow over a wing and calculate lift-to-drag ratio.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze aerodynamic heating and recommend thermal protection systems.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a spacecraft structure to withstand the stresses of launch and re-entry.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform calculations to determine the optimal orbital trajectory for a satellite.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Complete the final exam on spacecraft systems engineering, covering key topics from the course.
